Title: XXVIII.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (created by), Robert Levine (created by), Jonathan E. Steinberg, Robert Levine, Marc Berzenski (staff writer), Lisa Schultz Boyd (staff writer), Joshua Rothenberger (staff writer)
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: Hornigold and the British come for the pirates; Rackham and Bonny face impossible odds; Silver demands answers from Flint; Billy crowns a king.
